unnormalised: Barabor, konnem tor internet-achea sogllea utranche arth somzunk sogleant boro marg koso mhunn vicharlem, mhunncheaak? Mhunntlear, "VPN" ani "bandwidth" ani hem sogllem kitem tem. Tem ekdom avghadd zata, khas korun konn novean suru korpi aslear. Mhojee Dadi mhaka he utranchi sodanch vicharta!
normalised: Boro, konnem tor internet-antli hi sogli utram somzunk ut'tom marg kitem mhunn vicharlem, sori? Mhunnllear, "V-P-N" ani "bandwidth" ani hea soglleanchi kitem goddi asa tem. Tem khub gollmollit zaunk xokta, khas korun je just nove suru kortat tankam. Mhoji Dadi mhaka hea utram vixim soglleach pautt vicharta!

unnormalised: Poileam, bhieunk naka! Internet-ak ek vhoddlem mohallem mhunn chint. "IP address" mhunntlear tumchea ghara-numbari bhaxen. "Website" mhunntlear tea mohalleantlem dukaan bhaxen. Mhunncheak, "domain name" (google.com bhaxen) tea dukhancho somzonk sopo ulo mhunnje. "172.217.160.142" vorvim nhoi, zo Google-cho aslolo IP address! Dishta? Atam somzota!
normalised: Poileach, bhienaka! Internetak ek vhoddli moholla mhunn chint. "I-P address" mhunnllear tumchea ghoracho ankddo. Ek "website" mhunnllear tea mohollantlem dokan. Mhunnllear, ek "domain name" (jem google dot com) techya dokanacho somptacho somptacho ullovo mhunnllear zata jem soklleak somzunk sompem poddtta. "Ek xembbor satt'tor don dot donxem sattra dot ek xembbor satt dot ek xembbor cholleais," jem Google-chem khorem I-P address asa tache bodlek! Polleilem? Atanch orth lagunk lagla!

unnormalised: Atam, "browser" (Chrome, Firefox, ityaadi) mhunnlear mohalleant bhonvonk tumchem vahan. "WiFi" mhunntlear tumchea gharaak mukhel roddak zoddpi disonaastnaa roddo. Tumchea kodde vegim "bandwidth" (Mbps vo Gbps-ant mejpak) aslear, te vhoddlea roddi bhaxen - odhik traffic (data) vegim vochonk xokta! Techak lagun tumchea videos-ak borea zoddnnecher kompuffer kamai unni zata.
normalised: Atam, ek "browser" (Chrome, Firefox, it'yadi) tem mohollant bhonvddi korunk tumchem vahan. "Wi-Fi" mhunnllear disona toslo rosto zo tumchea ghorak mukhel rostyak zoddtta. Tumchea kodden vegim "bandwidth" aslear (M-b-p-s vo G-b-p-s merun ghetla), tem ek vhodd rosto aslea bhaxen - odhik traffic (data) vegim vochum yeta! Techak lagun tumche videos bore connection-ar unnem buffer zatat.

unnormalised: Magir "cloud storage" asa - mohalleantlea komunity-kendrantlem lokker mhunn chint zaka tumi tumchya file-aak sangraunk xoktat. "URL" mhunntlear ek website-antlea kitem-tachem nirdishtt ulo mhunncheak - Myntra.com-cher sari-chem sthan. Ani "OTP" - One-Time Password - tem tumi kiteim login zataastana tumchea fonacher mellpi odhik patraanni. Ek fancy imarotichea dharapal bhaxen.
normalised: Uprant "cloud storage" asa - tea mohollantlea samajik kendrak tuji file dovrunk ek locker mhunn chint. "U-R-L" mhunnllear kitem-i ek website-antlem nirdisht ulovo - Myntra dot com-acher saree-chem khorem sthan mhunnllear. Ani "O-T-P" - One-Time Password - tem ek extra suchovnicho code tumchea phone-ar tum kiteim login korunk provas kortat tedna tumkam melltta. Eka borea buildingachea darak boslolea suraksha rakhonnadar bhaxen.

unnormalised: Soglleant boro marg xikpaak mhunnlear korun pollounk. Tumka somzonak utraam Google-cher ("search engine" - mohalleantle mahitiche kendra bhaxen!) sodhun bhieunk naka. YouTube videos pollo (bandwidth ugddas asa?). Tumchea tek-savvy bhauvoilea vo pajariak vichara (amchea soglleanche kodde ek aassi!). Muhim mhunnlear, ragaar zaai, chai piyai, ani chinta korinaka. Tumka vella bhitor somzonk yetolem, bhai!
normalised: Khorench, xikpacho ut'tom marg mhunnllear korun polloup. Tumkam zonn utram somzonant tim Google korunk bhieunaka ("search engine" - tea mohollachea mahiti kendrak mhunnllear!). YouTube videos polluiat (bandwidth ugddas asa?). Tumchea tech-savvy kuzink vo voxeak vichar (amche kodden ek tori astat!). Mukhy mhunnllear, nirdoost rava, kiteim chai pia, ani khuim dhoddos gheunaka. Tumi vell lagina astana tem xiktelet, bhai!
